member.summary: Gets the start date displayed in the Resource view.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.EndDate
member.summary: Gets the end date displayed in the Resource view.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.HeaderSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of space between headers.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.LaneSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of a single lane.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.GroupRowHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the rows display the header as a group header.
member.remarks: This property is only used if the view style is set to Lanes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RealGroupRowHeader
member.summary: Gets whether rows display group header. The rows always display group header in ResourceViewStyle.General.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RowHeaderSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the row header.
member.remarks: The size of a header is used only when GroupRowHeader is enabled. Otherwise, the size of the header equals LaneSize.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ExpandableRows
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the rows in the resource view can be expanded/collapsed.
member.remarks: This property is only used if the view style is set to Lanes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RealExpandableRows
member.summary: Gets or sets whether rows can be collapsed. The rows can be expanded/collapsed only in ResourceViewStyle.Lanes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ExpandActiveItemOn
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the active item should ignore collisions.
member.remarks: This only works if the ViewStyle is set to General.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.GridStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the grid lines.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.InnerGridStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the internal grid lines.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ResourceLengthMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the method used to calculate the length of the resources.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.MinResourceLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum length for resources when the ResourceLengthMethod is set to MinimumFixed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.VisibleRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows visible in the view.
member.remarks: This property is only used if the view style is set to General.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.MinRowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest size allowed for resource rows.
member.remarks: This property is only used if the view style is set to General.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.MinItemSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest size allowed for resource items.
member.remarks: If there is not enough space in a row to display all related items, the items that do not fit remain invisible. This property is only used if the view style is set to General.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.MaxItemSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the largest size allowed for resource items.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.SnapUnit
member.summary: Gets or sets the snap unit.
member.remarks: Specifies the time unit of the nearest value to align to when an item is being modified interactively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.SnapUnitCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the snap unit count.
member.remarks: When SnapUnitCount is 1 the snapping is absolute. When SnapUnitCount is greater than 1, then the snapping is relative to the element being dragged.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ShowSubTicks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the view displays sub ticks in the bottom timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.SubTickSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the sub ticks displayed in the bottom timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ShowResourceDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the duration of individual resources.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ResourceResizeMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the method to be used when resizing resources in the view.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.HeaderShadowStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the shadows cast by headers.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.HeaderShadowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the shadow cast by headers.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.HeaderShadowOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the shadows from the headers that cast them.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.ShowPaddingDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display padding dates.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.HiddenDays
member.summary: Gets or sets the days of the week that should not be displayed in a resource view.
member.remarks: This property determines which days should be filtered (that is, not displayed) in a resource view. This setting only works if the Unit is set to Days or Hours.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.VisibleStartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the first visible time of displayed days.
member.remarks: This setting only works if the Unit is set to Hours and the UnitCount is set to 1 or if the Unit is set to Minutes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RealVisibleStartTime
member.summary: Gets the VisibleStartTime if the timeline unit is set to Hour, or TimeSpan.Zero in any other case.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.VisibleEndTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the last visible time of displayed days. This setting works only if the TimeUnit is set to Hours.
member.remarks: This setting only works if the Unit is set to Hours and the UnitCount is set to 1 or if the Unit is set to Minutes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.CellOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the time offset of the first cell from the origin of the resource view.
member.remarks: The offset is specified in the units set in BottomTimelineSettings.Unit.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.EnableRowTitleFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the RowTitleFormat property will be taken into consideration.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.AllowResizeRowHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the users can resize the row headers when GroupRowHeader is enabled.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.EnableCollisions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item collision processing is enabled.
member.remarks: Turn this flag off if you don't need collision detection to improve performance.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RowTitleFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to format and display resource titles in row headers.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RowFormat
member.summary: Returns a GeneralFormat object corresponding to the RowTitleFormat property.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.RealVisibleEndTime
member.summary: Gets the VisibleEndTime if the timeline unit is set to Hour, or TimeSpan.FromHours(24) in any other case.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewSettings.IsHiding
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether there are hidden dates or time ranges in the view.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence
member.summary: Defines recurrence patterns for items scheduled to repeat over and over again.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Recurrence class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ToString(System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo,System.Globalization.Calendar)
member.summary: Creates a string from this recurrence using the specified date and time formatting.
member.param: Defines how date and time values are formatted and displayed.
An object that specifies the calendar to use for calculating the end date of the recurrence.
member.returns: A string representation of the recurrence object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ToString
member.summary: Creates a string from this recurrence using the date and time formatting information defined in the current culture.
member.returns: A string representation of the recurrence object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ToLocalizedString(System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo,System.Globalization.Calendar,MindFusion.Scheduling.LocalizationInfo)
member.summary: Returns a localized string that represents this Recurrence using the specified date and time formatting info and localization information.
member.param: Specifies how date and time values are formatted and displayed.
An object that specifies the calendar to use for calculating the end date of the recurrence.
Specifies localized strings used in the representation.
member.returns: A localized string representation of this Recurrence object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this Recurrence object.
member.returns: A new Recurrence object, cloned from this one.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SamePatternAs(MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence)
member.summary: Determines whether two Recurrence objects define the same recurrence pattern.
member.param: A Recurrence object to compare with this recurrence.
member.returns: true if the Recurrence instances represent the same recurrence patterns; otherwise false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ApplyPattern(MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence)
member.summary: Copies the fields of the specified Recurrence object to this recurrence.
member.param: The Recurrence object whose fields to copy.
member.remarks: This method behaves similarly to the Clone method except that it does not create a new object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetEndDate(System.Globalization.Calendar)
member.summary: Returns the end date for this recurrence.
member.param: An object that specifies the calendar to use for calculating the end date of the recurrence.
member.remarks: The end date is calculated from the specified repeat number if RecurrenceEnd is set to NumOccurrences.
member.returns: The end date of the recurrence if the recurrence is set to expire or DateTime.MaxValue otherwise.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the recurrence data to a binary stream.
member.param: Allows writing primitive data types to the binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves the recurrence properties as bytes in a binary stream. Use LoadFrom to restore the property later.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads the recurrence data from a binary stream.
member.param: Allows reading primitive data types from the binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: Loads the state of a recurrence from a binary stream where it was previously saved via SaveTo.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the recurrence data to an XML document.
member.param: Allows adding data to the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: The recurrence properties are saved as elements of an XML document, and can be later restored using the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads the recurrence data from an XML document.
member.param: Allows reading data from the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: Loads the state of a recurrence from an XML document, where it was previously saved via SaveTo.

member.summary: Returns the occurrence having the specified index.
member.param: The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.

An object that specifies the calendar to use for calculating the occurrences of the recurrence.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetOccurrence(System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Returns the occurrence having the specified index.
member.param: The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter contains upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

An object that specifies the calendar to use for calculating the occurrences of the recurrence.
If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter contains upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.

If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter contains upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
Specifies whether to return the original item, in case this occurrence is an exception.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

member.summary: Marks the specified item as an exception of a recurrence pattern.
member.param: The Item instance to be marked as an exception.
Specifies whether the exception is created by deleting one occurrence from the recurrent pattern or by changing the occurrence time properties.
member.remarks: The Calendar control calls this method when a user drags an occurrence item or edits its text, thus creating an exception of the recurrence.

member.summary: Actually marks the specified item as an exception of the recurrence pattern.

member.summary: Removes the exception associated with the specified item from the recurrence.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.DailyRecurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of daily recurrence.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MonthlyRecurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of monthly recurrence.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of yearly recurrence.

member.summary: Gets or sets how many days should pass before the event occurs again.
member.remarks: This value is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to Daily.

member.summary: Gets or sets on which day of a month the event occurs.
member.remarks: This value is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to Monthly or Yearly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Weeks
member.summary: Gets or sets how many weeks should pass before the event occurs again.
member.remarks: This value is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to Weekly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: Gets or sets on which days of a week the event occurs.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Months
member.summary: Gets or sets how many months should pass before the event occurs again.
member.remarks: The value of this property is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to Monthly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MonthOfYear

member.remarks: The value of this property is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to Yearly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Occurrence

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Interval

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ItemAttachedData.ForcePriority
member.summary: Gets or sets the force priority of the item.
member.remarks: This is essentially the same as Item.Priority, differing from it only by the fact it is applied first. The Item.Priority is used only if this property is equal amongst the compared items. This property is used in the FreeDrag-enabled List views to ensure that the currently modified item will push down any colliding items, which are not being modified.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ItemEqualityComparer
member.summary: Provides comparison of items for equality in such way, that comparing an item for equality with the same occurrence of a recurring item reports true, although the occurrence might be an instance from a different generation.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.document
member.summary: The underlying document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.brushes
member.summary: A map of all brushes.
member.remarks: During serialization, this map will contain all serialized brushes, mapped to their indices. During deserialization, the brushes are loaded from the appropriate section in the Xml file, the first time they are accessed. This list is of type (Brush, int) when serializing and of type (int, Brush) when deserializing.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.images
member.summary: A map of all images.
member.remarks: During serialization, this map will contain all serialized images, mapped to their indices. During deserialization, the images are loaded from the appropriate section in the Xml file, the first time they are accessed. This list is of type (Image, int) when serializing and of type (int, Image) when deserializing.

member.summary: The contents are aligned near the layout rectangle. In a left-to-right layout, the near position is left. In a right-to-left layout, the near position is right.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.ValidateOccurrenceEventArgs.RecurrenceIndex
member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the occurrence being validated.
member.remarks: At the time the item is being validated, it is still not marked as occurrence and its Item.RecurrenceIndex property returns -1. Therefore you need to use this property to obtain the actual recurrence index of the item. This is done to allow you to change any of the item's properties without forcing it to become an exception.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.ResourceViewHelper.CalculateEndDate(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.Calendar,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Single,System.Int64)
member.summary: Calculates the end date of an item according to the Calendar settings.
member.param: The item whose end date is to be calculated.
The calendar control to obtain settings from.
The graphics to use for measurement.
The size of a cell (in pixels).
The time span of a cell (in ticks).
member.remarks:
If the ResourceLengthMethod is Exact, the returned date is the item's actual end date.
If the method is MinimumFixed, the returned date is the later from the item's actual end date and the so calculated date, that the required item length is achieved.
If the method is MinimumAuto, the returned date is the later from the item's actual end date and the so calculated date, that the item contents would fit.

member.summary: Specifies the type of view to display in a calendar control.

member.summary: The calendar displays several months in a grid. The days of each month are visible too.

member.summary: The calendar displays a single month at a time. The days of the month are displayed in a grid.

member.summary: The calendar displays a grid of days, with the columns representing the week days from Monday to Sunday and the rows representing weeks.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.CalendarView.List
member.summary: The calendar displays several seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months or years in a row or a column.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.CalendarView.Timetable
member.summary: The calendar displays a timetable where each row represents a fixed arbitrary time interval and each column represents a day. This view allow further division by various grouping criteria such as by contacts, locations or tasks.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the appointment data to a binary stream.
member.param: Allows writing primitive data types to a binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.

member.summary: Saves the appointment data to an XML document.
member.param: Allows adding data to the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves the task properties as elements in an XML document. Later they can be restored via the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads task data from a binary stream.
member.param: Allows reading primitive data types from the binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method loads the task properties from a binary stream where they were previously saved by SaveTo.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the task data to an XML document.
member.param: Allows adding data to the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method saves the task properties as elements in an XML document. Later they can be restored via the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads task data from an XML document.
member.param: Allows reading data from the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method loads the task properties from an XML document where they were previously saved by SaveTo.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the timeline.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the timeline displays tick lines.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.TimelineSettings.SpanTexts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether some cell texts will span more than one cell when the space in their corresponding cells is insufficient due to scaling the view.
member.remarks: The number of spanned cells is specified by the SpanCellCount property. If the value of this property is 0, then the number of cells is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by the TimelineScale property.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.TimelineSettings.SpanCellCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of cells to span when SpanTexts is enabled.
member.remarks: If this value is 0, it is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by TimelineScale.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.TimelineSettings.ShowCurrentTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to indicate the current time in the timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.TimelineSettings.NowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to mark the current time in the timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.TimelineSettings.NowFillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color used to mark the current time in the timeline.

member.summary: Fired when the settings have changed.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder
member.summary: Represents reminders associated with schedule items.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Reminder class.

member.summary: Clones this Reminder object.
member.returns: An exact copy of this reminder.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the reminder data to a binary stream.
member.param: Allows writing primitive data types to the binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves the reminder object fields as bytes in a binary stream. They can be restored later via the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads reminder data from a binary stream.
member.param: Allows reading primitive data types from the binary stream.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method loads the reminder fields from a binary stream where they were previously saved via SaveTo.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the reminder data to an XML document.
member.param: Allows adding data to the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method saved the reminder object fields as elements in a XML document. They can be restored later using the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads reminder data from an XML document.
member.param: Allows reading data from the XML document.
The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method loads the reminder fields from an XML document, where they were previously saved via SaveTo.

member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the Draw event.

Initializes a new instance of the DrawEventArgs class with associated date or start and end minute. To indicate no date, supply DateTime.MinValue. To indicate no start and end time, specify 0s for both.
